serviceUrl.description: rest sevrice URL for the component

keyAttribute.description: Primary key of the data collection returned by rest service

dataSource.description: CollectionTableDataSource for the component (optional under discussion)

columnsList.description: table column that wants to show

rowSelection.description: row selection type single or multiple

simpleTableFilterMethod.description: A custom incoming event for Jet that creates an event to send across the E-mail ID of the primary contact
